title: Review quarterly budget reports
description: Analyze Q3 financial performance and prepare insights for the board meeting. Focus on expense variances and revenue trends.

title: Update project documentation
description: Refresh API documentation and user guides for the latest feature releases. Ensure all examples are current.

title: Schedule team performance reviews
description: Coordinate with HR to set up individual review sessions for all team members. Prepare evaluation materials.

title: Research new marketing automation tools
description: Evaluate 3-4 marketing platforms for email campaigns and social media scheduling. Create comparison matrix.

title: Prepare presentation for client meeting
description: Create slide deck showcasing project progress and next phase proposal. Include timeline and budget estimates.
